item.title: Black & White Cellular Automata
item.description: Based on Cliff Biffle’s tremendously cool rust+webassembly series. This just flips through the various “1D” cellular automata you can make with two states and self+neighbor patterns, choosing from a few possible starting states. Most of ’em end up not that interesting, but it was fun to practice my rust.
